Text: if its possible could you get spector pro 2010?

I think it might be something to do with the new MKV splitting ability as i can re-install and use the older versions without any problems. Anybogy got any suggestions as to the problem? Great program, downloaded in 10 secs and works perfectly. Thanks HB

Quote:

"Boilsoft Video Splitter has two different splitting mode, Direct Stream Splitting Mode and  Encode Splitting Mode.

Direct Stream Splitting Mode only supports splitting file to source file format. Formats including AVI, MPEG, VOB, MP4, 3GP, RM,ASF/WMV/WMA, MKV and MP3 are all supported.Output file quality is the same with source video/audio quality. Splitting speed is extremely high. Split 10 times faster than the Encode Mode.

Encode Splitting Mode supports splitting any format video to any format and output to any format file as you like. Supports nearly all kinds of video formats."
Thanks for the new version I always use Boilsoft Splitter it never disappointed me.
Thanks for this great upload. Works fine for me :D
